name: synopsys-coverity
description: The Azure Dev Ops plugin for Synopsys Coverity.
author: Synopsys

inputs.name: coverityService
inputs.label: Coverity Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Coverity end point to use. Click on 'manage' and add a new Service Endpoint of type 'Coverity'

inputs.name: projectName
inputs.label: Project name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the project to use on the Coverity Server.

inputs.name: streamName
inputs.label: Stream name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the project to use on the Coverity Server.

inputs.name: issueView
inputs.label: Coverity view
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Coverity view that you would like to check for issues.

inputs.name: issueStatus
inputs.label: Build status if issues are present
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the project to use on the Coverity Server.

inputs.name: coverityBuildDirectory
inputs.label: Coverity Build Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory to run the coverity tool in.

inputs.name: coverityRunType
inputs.label: Coverity run configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the project to use on the Coverity Server.

options.buildanalyzecommit: Run Coverity build, analyze and commit defects

inputs.name: coverityAnalysisType
inputs.label: Analysis type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the type of analysis you would like to run.

inputs.name: covBuildArgs
inputs.label: cov-build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify additional arguments to apply to the invocation of the cov-build command. Affects full and incremental analysis.

inputs.name: covAnalyzeArgs
inputs.label: cov-analyze
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify additional arguments to apply to the invocation of the cov-analyze command. Affects full analysis.

inputs.name: covDesktopArgs
inputs.label: cov-run-desktop
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify additional arguments to apply to the invocation of the cov-run-desktop command. Affects incremental analysis.

inputs.name: covCommitArgs
inputs.label: cov-commit-defects
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify additional arguments to apply to the invocation of the cov-commit-defects command. Affects both full and incremental analysis.

inputs.name: customCoverityCommands
inputs.label: Custom coverity commands
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of Coverity commands seperated by newlines. Commands should look like cov-build or cov-analyze. All TFS environment variables as well as Coverity Extension environment variables are available.
